entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -27.3°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -30.5°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
